en.title: Amend your application
en.ifYouWantYour: If you want your divorce to continue, you need to resubmit the application using a different reason (fact) for divorce.
en.amendmentFee: You’ll also have to pay an amendment fee of £{{ amendFee }}.
en.notAbleToRead: You won’t be able to read your {{ divorceWho }}’s response after you started amending your application. Go back a screen if you want to read it again.

cy.title: Gwneud newidiadau i’ch cais
cy.ifYouWantYour: Os ydych eisiau i’ch ysgariad barhau, mae angen ichi ailgyflwyno’r cais a defnyddio rheswm gwahanol (ffaith) dros yr ysgariad.
cy.amendmentFee: Bydd rhaid ichi hefyd dalu ffi o £{{ amendFee }} i newid eich cais.
cy.notAbleToRead: Ni fyddwch yn gallu darllen ymateb eich {{ divorceWho }} ar ôl ichi ddechrau gwneud newidiadau i’ch cais. Ewch un sgrin yn ôl os ydych eisiau ei ddarllen eto.
